oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: National Life Girls Chorus perform Think On Me on Noontime Neighbors
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The National Life Girls Chorus with conductor Marvin Hughes and accompanist Frank Bobo perform Think On Me on WSM's Noontime Neighbors program, September 11, 1947.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: National Life Girls Chorus
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: John McDonald introduces the National Life Girls Chorus -- Think On Me (National Life Girls Chorus)
